input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Billing Statement

I received an unexpected charge on my billing statement. This might have occurred due to misconfiguration of my account. I have tried to reconcile my account and reviewed my payment history, but the issue still persists You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. Could you please assist me in resolving this matter as soon as possible? My name is Liu Wei.
